snippet: The sailors were convicted in a rape last year that provoked so much local anger that the American military was forced to impose a curfew.
abstract: Japanese court sentences two United States Navy sailors to lengthy terms after they plead guilty to rape of woman in Okinawa, case that outraged local residents and forced American military to impose curfew on all its personnel in Japan.
lead_paragraph: The sailors were convicted in a rape last year that provoked so much local anger that the American military was forced to impose a curfew.

headline.seo: Japanese Court Sentences 2 U.S. Sailors to Prison in Okinawa Rape
headline.main: Japan Sentences 2 U.S. Sailors to Prison for Rape on Okinawa
headline.print_headline: Japan Sentences 2 U.S. Sailors To Prison for Rape on Okinawa
